parameters.description: 3-leter IATA airport or city code (e.g. 'ZRH')
parameters.name: location

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: Cabin class: 'M', 'E', 'C', 'F' (Acceptable values are: "", "M", "E", "C", "F")
parameters.name: cabinClass

parameters.description: Frequent flyer level ('FTL', 'SGC', 'SEN', 'HON') (Acceptable values are: "", "FTL", "SGC", "SEN", "HON")
parameters.name: tierCode

parameters.description: Language code.
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Flight number including carrier code and any suffix (e.g. 'LH2037')
parameters.name: flightNumber

parameters.description: Departure airport. 3-letter IATA airport code (e.g. 'TXL')
parameters.name: origin

parameters.description: Destination airport. 3-letter IATA airport code (e.g. 'MUC')
parameters.name: destination

parameters.description: Departure date (YYYY-MM-DD)
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Cabin class: 'M', 'E', 'C', 'F'. Some flights have fewer classes (Acceptable values are: "M", "E", "C", "F")
parameters.name: cabinClass

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

get.description: Status of all arrivals at a given airport up to 4 hours from the provided date time.

parameters.description: 3-letter IATA aiport code (e.g. 'ZRH')
parameters.name: airportCode

parameters.description: Start of time range in local time of arrival airport (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm)
parameters.name: fromDateTime

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset

get.description: Status of all departures from a given airport up to 4 hours from the provided date time.

parameters.description: Departure airport. 3-letter IATA airport code (e.g. 'HAM')
parameters.name: airportCode

parameters.description: Start of time range in local time of departure airport (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm)
parameters.name: fromDateTime

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset

get.description: Status of flights between a given origin and destination on a given date.

parameters.description: 3-letter IATA airport (e.g. 'FRA')
parameters.name: origin

parameters.description: 3-letter IATA airport code (e.g. 'JFK')
parameters.name: destination

parameters.description: Departure date (YYYY-MM-DD) in local time of departure airport
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset

get.description: Status of a particular flight (boarding, delayed, etc.).

parameters.description: Flight number including carrier code and any suffix (e.g. 'LH400')
parameters.name: flightNumber

parameters.description: The departure date (YYYY-MM-DD) in the local time of the departure airport
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset

get.description: Scheduled flights between given airports on a given date.

parameters.description: Departure airport. 3-letter IATA airport code (e.g. 'ZRH')
parameters.name: origin

parameters.description: Destination airport. 3-letter IATA airport code (e.g. 'FRA')
parameters.name: destination

parameters.description: Local departure date and optionally departure time (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm). When not provided, time is assumed to be 00:01
parameters.name: fromDateTime

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: Show only direct flights (false=0, true=1). Default is false
parameters.name: directFlights

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset

get.description: List all aircraft types or one specific aircraft type.

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: 3-character IATA aircraft code
parameters.name: aircraftCode

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset

get.description: List all airlines or one specific airline.

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: 2-character IATA airline/carrier code
parameters.name: airlineCode

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset

get.description: List the 5 closest airports to the given latitude and longitude, irrespective of the radius of the reference point.

parameters.description: Latitude in decimal format to at most 3 decimal places
parameters.name: latitude

parameters.description: Longitude in decimal format to at most 3 decimal places
parameters.name: longitude

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: 2 letter ISO 3166-1 language code
parameters.name: lang

get.description: List all airports or one specific airport. All airports response is very large. It is possible to request the response in a specific language.

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: 3-letter IATA airport code
parameters.name: airportCode

parameters.description: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 language code
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Restrict the results to locations with flights operated by LH (false=0, true=1)
parameters.name: LHoperated

get.description: List all cities or one specific city. It is possible to request the response in a specific language.

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: 3-letter IATA city code
parameters.name: cityCode

parameters.description: 2 letter ISO 3166-1 language code
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset

get.description: List all countries or one specific country. It is possible to request the response in a specific language.

parameters.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")
parameters.name: Accept

parameters.description: 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code
parameters.name: countryCode

parameters.description: 2 letter ISO 3166-1 language code
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Number of records returned per request. Defaults to 20, maximum is 100 (if a value bigger than 100 is given, 100 will be taken)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records skipped. Defaults to 0
parameters.name: offset
